title:
Wishing all here a Joyful, Blessed DEEPAVALI.
May the festival of lights bring you the gifts of colors...

attachments.displayName:
Wishing all here a Joyful, Blessed DEEPAVALI.
May the festival of lights bring you the gifts of colors, peace, bliss, light, happiness, success, divine grace into your life, now & forever.
May you continue to grow in everlasting love & light.
May the Divine forces be with you & within you in every way always.
SHINE ON,...Keep on loving, Be loved :

object.content:
Wishing all here a Joyful, Blessed DEEPAVALI. 
May the festival of lights bring you the gifts of colors, peace, bliss, light, happiness, success, divine grace into your life, now & forever. 
May you continue to grow in everlasting love & light. 
May the Divine forces be with you & within you in every way always.
SHINE ON,...Keep on loving, Be loved :
